text: V den' velikogo palomnichestva Allakh i Yego Poslannik ob"yavyat lyudyam o tom, chto Allakh i Yego Poslannik otrekayutsya ot mnogobozhnikov. Yesli vy raskayetes', to tem luchshe dlya vas. Yesli zhe vy otvernetes', to znayte, chto vam ne sbezhat' ot Allakha. Obraduy zhe vest'yu o muchitel'nykh stradaniyakh neveruyushchikh
